meanings.sent1: She decided to reembroider the flower on her dress to make it more colorful.
meanings.sent2: She carefully reembroidered the pattern on the fabric to fix a mistake.
meanings.sent3: After realizing she used the wrong thread, she had to reembroider the design on the pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her love for sewing was so strong that she would reembroider any piece that needed a touch-up.
meanings.sent5: The old quilt was reembroidered with new patterns, bringing it back to life.

meanings.sent1: She proudly displayed the reembroidered handkerchief at the craft fair.
meanings.sent2: The dress was beautifully reembroidered with intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The reembroidered scarf caught everyone's attention with its vibrant colors.
meanings.sent4: The reembroidered tablecloth looked as good as new for the special dinner.
meanings.sent5: The reembroidered pillowcase added a touch of elegance to the room.

meanings.sent1: The reembroidered jacket was a unique piece in her collection.
meanings.sent2: She wore the reembroidered gloves to keep her hands warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The reembroidered hat was a thoughtful gift from her grandmother.
meanings.sent4: The reembroidered blanket was a cozy addition to the living room.
meanings.sent5: The reembroidered bag was her favorite accessory for any outfit.
